Name: The Madness of Little Emma
About the game: Emma was living alone with her younger brother until one day he has disappeared in eerie circumstances. Help Emma find her brother and learn what has happened. Gameplay The Madness of Little Emma is a randomly generated action platformer with heavy Rogue-like elements. In her journey Emma will discover tons of varied items and encounter multitudes of unique enemies. Key Features: Over 100 hours of challenging gameplay Over 250 items 5 playable characters - each with completely different playstyle Almost a hundred unique enemy types 25 bosses Five episodes and multiple hidden areas Persistent Steam leaderboard A curious story 6 cutscenes (intro + 5 endings) XB360 Controller support Top-quality pixel art Cinematic music Lots of Achievements and unlockables Tons of Secrets
